pages.text: The $(mob)Sphinx$() is a monster that spawns in the Deserts of the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It attacks players on sight, inflicting $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Mining Fatigue$() with its melee strikes. It is immune to falling damage, Fire, drowning, and ranged attacks. It can move through cobwebs and water unimpeded. When a $(mob)Sphinx's$() health drops below 75% it will regenerate 10% of its total health.
$(mob)Sphinxes$() drop $(item)Golden Apple Pie Slices$() on death, which can be eaten to grant players the same benefits as gained from eating a $(item)Golden Apple$().
$(mob)Sphinxes$() rarely drop $(item)Desert Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive two random ittems found in Desert Pyramids.
